Name: The Elmian Warrior
About the game: You have been revived as the last member of the Elmian Tribe by a mad doctor. Get yourself ready to come across ancient ruins, an abandoned city, and more to obtain LOTS of weapons and cleanse the demon-infested Egarim Island! The demons won't give in so easily, though... Get yourself ready to slaughter TONS of demons with nothing but your own wits, and whatever treasures you can find! Explore, and find a BAZILLION weapons and tons of treasure! Said treasure is also randomized! Lots of demons for you to go out and murder! An open world that actually has stuff in it! Find dungeons that can be completed in any order you choose! Quirky characters that you can meet that talk about stuff like murder, certain places, or their worthless personal problems. Ever wanted to make things explode, start big fires, smack stuff with oversized fantasy weapons for the millionth time, or shoot things with guns in a non-FPS game?
